column1: #Text=Korra says : " You two have n't spoken in thirty years ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Oh , do n't put that on me .
#Text=You 're the one who tore our family apart .
#Text=" Suyin says : " And you 've done a bang up job keeping it that way .
#Text=" Lin says : " You have n't changed one bit , have you ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Look , we can stay here arguing about the past all day , but that 's not reason the Avatar came here .
#Text=My daughter is thrilled to meet you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Lin , your niece is the new airbender !
